## Edge class

Quad-edge implementation after Guibas &amp; Stolfi. Based on C++ versions by Paul Heckbert, Dani Lischinski et al:

References:

- [http://www.cs.cmu.edu/afs/andrew/scs/cs/15-463/2001/pub/src/a2/quadedge.html](http://www.cs.cmu.edu/afs/andrew/scs/cs/15-463/2001/pub/src/a2/quadedge.html) - [http://www.cs.cmu.edu/afs/andrew/scs/cs/15-463/2001/pub/src/a2/lischinski/114.ps](http://www.cs.cmu.edu/afs/andrew/scs/cs/15-463/2001/pub/src/a2/lischinski/114.ps)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Edge<T> 
```

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(parent, id)](./quad-edge.edge._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Edge</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [dest](./quad-edge.edge.dest.md) |  | <code>T</code> | Returns this edge's dest vertex. I.e. <code>this.sym.origin</code> |
|  [dnext](./quad-edge.edge.dnext.md) |  | <code>Edge&lt;T&gt;</code> | Next CCW edge to this edge's dest. |
|  [dprev](./quad-edge.edge.dprev.md) |  | <code>Edge&lt;T&gt;</code> | Next CW edge to this edge's dest. |
|  [id](./quad-edge.edge.id.md) |  | <code>number</code> |  |
|  [invrot](./quad-edge.edge.invrot.md) |  | <code>Edge&lt;T&gt;</code> | Dual of this edge, left -<!-- -->&gt; right. I.e same as <code>this.rot.sym</code> |
|  [lnext](./quad-edge.edge.lnext.md) |  | <code>Edge&lt;T&gt;</code> | Next CCW edge around the left face (dual vertex) from this edge's dest. |
|  [lprev](./quad-edge.edge.lprev.md) |  | <code>Edge&lt;T&gt;</code> | Next CCW edge around the left face (dual vertex) to this edge's origin. |
|  [onext](./quad-edge.edge.onext.md) |  | <code>Edge&lt;T&gt;</code> | Next CCW edge from this edge's origin. |
|  [oprev](./quad-edge.edge.oprev.md) |  | <code>Edge&lt;T&gt;</code> | Next CW edge from this edge's origin. |
|  [origin](./quad-edge.edge.origin.md) |  | <code>T</code> |  |
|  [parent](./quad-edge.edge.parent.md) |  | <code>QuadEdge&lt;T&gt;</code> |  |
|  [rnext](./quad-edge.edge.rnext.md) |  | <code>Edge&lt;T&gt;</code> | Next CCW edge around the right face (dual vertex) to this edge's dest. |
|  [rot](./quad-edge.edge.rot.md) |  | <code>Edge&lt;T&gt;</code> | Dual of this edge, right -<!-- -->&gt; left. |
|  [rprev](./quad-edge.edge.rprev.md) |  | <code>Edge&lt;T&gt;</code> | Next CCW edge around the right face (dual vertex) to this edge's origin. |
|  [sym](./quad-edge.edge.sym.md) |  | <code>Edge&lt;T&gt;</code> | Symmetric partner edge of this edge, from dest -<!-- -->&gt; src. I.e. <code>this === this.sym.sym</code> |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [connect(e)](./quad-edge.edge.connect.md) |  |  |
|  [create(src, dest)](./quad-edge.edge.create.md) | <code>static</code> | Main edge / quadedge factory function. Use this in preference of direct invocation of the [Edge](./quad-edge.edge.md) constructor.<!-- -->Creates new [QuadEdge](./quad-edge.quadedge.md) with 4 child edges and returns the first child/primary edge. If <code>src</code> and <code>dest</code> are not <code>null</code>ish, the given args will be associated with that new edge as end points. |
|  [remove()](./quad-edge.edge.remove.md) |  |  |
|  [setEnds(o, d)](./quad-edge.edge.setends.md) |  | Sets the origin &amp; dest vertices of this edge (in other words, the origins of this edge and <code>this.sym</code>). |
|  [splice(e)](./quad-edge.edge.splice.md) |  | Modifies the edge rings around the origins of this edge and <code>e</code>, as well as, independently, the edge rings of both edges' left dual vertex. In each case, if the rings are separate, this operator will join them and if both rings are the same ring, they will be split / separated. Therefore, splice<!-- -->\` is it's own reverse operator and the only operator needed to edit quad edge topologies. |
|  [swap()](./quad-edge.edge.swap.md) |  |  |
